official_title: To require institutions of higher education to report annually on the use of race, color, or national origin in the admissions process.

summary.text:
Sunshine in Academic Admissions Act

This bill requires each institution of higher education that participates in a program under title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to submit an annual report to the Department of Education that states whether the institution gives weight to race, color, or national origin in the admissions process and, if yes, provides certain additional disclosures. The institution must make the report publicly available.
